meanings.definition: To make neat or smart in appearance
meanings.sent1: She spruces up her room before guests come over.
meanings.sent2: He always spruces himself up before going on a date.
meanings.sent3: The cat spruces up its fur before meeting the other cats.
meanings.sent4: The magician spruces up his act with new tricks.
meanings.sent5: The gardener spruces up the garden for the spring festival.

meanings.definition: A type of evergreen tree with needle-like leaves
meanings.sent1: The spruces in the forest stay green all year round.
meanings.sent2: We decorated the house with spruces for Christmas.
meanings.sent3: The spruces in the park provide shade for picnics.
meanings.sent4: The spruces stand tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The spruces sway gently in the breeze, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To make more lively or attractive
meanings.sent1: Adding some colorful pillows spruces up the living room.
meanings.sent2: Music always spruces up a dull party.
meanings.sent3: The clown spruces up the birthday party with funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile spruces up the room like sunshine.
meanings.sent5: A fresh coat of paint spruces up the old house beautifully.
